content: Ive been accepted into HPCP and am awaiting for the security clearance. How long does it usually take to pass/fail the clearance?
reply: Ive been accepted into HPCP and am awaiting for the security clearance. How long does it usually take to pass/fail the clearance?
title: JPAS-how long does it take?

content: quote: Originally posted by Soon2bPAstudent: Ive been accepted into HPCP and am awaiting for the security clearance. How long does it usually take to pass/fail the clearance? Hewlett-Packard Certified Professional? Great , can you fix my printer? Seriously, how long does it take to process a security clearance? In September 2006 defense contractors reported average end-to-end processing time of over one year for Top Secret clearances. source+++http://www.clearancejobs.com/security_clearance_faq.pdf remove pluses and paste in browser You should know something after all the "shirts" do their face to face interviews with your known "associates", imo.

content: quote: Originally posted by Soon2bPAstudent: Ive been accepted into HPCP and am awaiting for the security clearance. How long does it usually take to pass/fail the clearance? It depends on the level of clearance and several other factors. Fortunately there is something called an Interim clearance. As long as the investigation has started and your boss thinks you are trustworthy you can get the Interim until the investigation is finalized.

content: Did you ask your security manager when you completed and released your e-Qip? Investigations at the secret level normally run 4-6 months; top secret run about 2-3 months longer. "The World's Finest"
reply: Did you ask your security manager when you completed and released your e-Qip? Investigations at the secret level normally run 4-6 months; top secret run about 2-3 months longer. "The World's Finest"
